name: CHIPS Protocol
description: CHIPS is the only Layer 1 blockchain purpose-built for real-money games and prediction markets. Chips Protocol is a L1 designed from the ground up to support global, decentralized, and provably fair speculation. CHIPS powers a world where anyone can launch a casino, spin up a market, or bet on what matters, instantly, transparently, and without asking permission. The rails are live. The house is open. And for the first time, you donâ€™t just play the game, you own it.
